title: JUNGLE
description: JUNGLE is a digital zine we created as a digital restpoint—a place for viewers to pause, drift, and reorient themselves in the midst of an overstimulated world. The pages are fragments—poems, images, and 3D environments—each one linking through hypertext.
author: Kevin Cunanan Chappelle and Lisa Yang
